channel.title: Blogdown on STOR-i Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogdown on STOR-i Blog

item.title: Blogging with blogdown
item.description: So, I’ve upgraded from the old and outdated ad-riddled wordpress, up to a nice hugo website generated by blogdown, an R package developed by Yihui Xie. You can have a look at my old wordpress here. In my opinion the new blog is a huge improvement and much more efficient too. Here I’ll give some basics on how to get started on making a similar one. So why did I update?
